title: Collaborative Professional Development for Enhancing Mathematics Teachers' Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of elementary mathematics pedagogy, proficiency in basic digital tools
context.additional_context: Collaborative professional development experiences for mathematics education innovation in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to design personalized mathematics instruction using digital technologies through collaborative problem-solving projects
Develop at least three field-applicable mathematics teaching strategies through feedback-based collaboration with peer teachers
Develop and simulate at least five mathematics learning activities using smartphone-based tools in actual classroom settings

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
